name: RGBeWitched
description:
The goal of RGBeWitched is to get all the tiles on each level to be one color. Shooting the forest sprites changes their tile, and matching tiles, to their color. Make sure you refill your magic at the crystal spots and utilize your dash! 

-CONTROLS-

WASD -  Move

MOUSE - Aims your wand

LEFT CLICK - Shoots your magic.

RIGHT CLICK - Dash

ESCAPE - Pause / Menu
